bodydiv.p: An entity acquires insurance contracts as part of a business combination within the scope of IFRS 3 and it:

li.p: determines that the transaction results in goodwill applying IFRS 3.
determines, applying paragraph B93, that those insurance contracts form a group consistent with paragraphs 14–24, as if it had entered into the contracts on the date of the transaction.
